posts.postText:
Your Minecraft ID: christmastroll
Your Age: 14
How did you learn about Goldcraft: My friends were playing minecraft, and they said they were on an nnjg server.
Why do you want to join Goldcraft: I would like to join goldcraft because of my friends playing it, And NNJG is probably one of the coolest groups of people i have met, So i would like to be able to play on goldcraft to hang out with you guys.
Steam Profile URL: http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198043774441

This is for Seargeant Teddy.

His name must not have transferred, or something.
Fuckin'' weird.

Whitelisted.
